mapper.sql: supplier_brand_id AS "supplierBrandId", customer_id AS "customerId", brand_id AS "brandId", display AS "display", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_supplier_brand where 1 = 1
and supplier_brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.supplierBrandId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
